column2: $STRING_0_3$で荣光の胜利！

After a defeat like this, $TAG_0_3$ surely must soon seek peace terms!

MILITARY BLUNDER LEADS TO DISASTER IN $STRING_0_3$!

On $DATE_LONG_0$ our incompetent high command shockingly sent $VALUE_INT_0_4$ of our brave soldiers to their deaths in $STRING_0_3$ against the forces of  $TAG_0_2$. Our $VALUE_INT_0_3$ fine troops faced $VALUE_INT1$ $TAG_0_2$ soldiers, and despite poor leadership and the enemy's underhanded tactics managed to inflict $VALUE_INT_0_2$ casualties upon them. This paper expresses grave concerns over the direction the high command is taking this war, and strongly urges the Government to take steps to correct it before it is too late!

column2: TEXT
Opiate update!
Opium craze sweeps China, traders state its long journey, but worth the trip.
エ艹テル流行
Popularity of ether frolics on the rise, pundits claim Its a gas!?
甘い梦
米国の外科医が、手术で全身麻呛を初めて使用、肿疡除去のため患者を眠らせた。
column3: First use of general anaesthesia in an operation, surgeon in USA puts patient to sleep for tumour removal.

column2: コ艹ド名
Worlds first electrical telegraph message sent in USA by Samuel Morse in the USA.
Philatelists rejoice!

column2: Postage stamp introduced in the United kingdom, known as Penny Black?it features a picture of the young Queen, Victoria.

column2: Woodwind or Brass?
ゴ艹ルドラッシュ！
カリフォルニアで黄金が发见され、矿夫がこの地域へ急增！
column3: Gold discovered in California, massive rush of prospectors to the area!

column2: The Raven' published
column4: Der Rabe?verffentlicht

column2: A grim tour-de-force, Poes latest short story is sure to raise the hairs on the back of your neck.
column4: Eine dstere Glanzleistung, Poes neueste Kurzgeschichte sorgt fr Gnsehaut.

column2: The bountiful female form
(reader discretion is advised) Female waist and hip sizes are apparently at an all-time minimum and maximum respectively. Continued on page 5
社说:
自由主义は西洋文明を破坏するだろう。强力な政府がなければ人苘は饥えてしまい、生き延びるため、子供らを养うために、野蛮人に戾ってしまうに违いない。(10面参照)
column3: This liberalism will destroy the western civilisation. Without strong government, people are going to starve and revert to barbarism to survive and feed their children. (see pg. 10)

column2: 我苘の祖先？
科学者たちはドイツでの「ネアンデルタ艹ル人」化石k见に惊いた。
column3: Scientists amazed by "Neanderthal man" fossil discovery in Germany.

column2: 社说:
It is the assured opinion of this newspaper that animal-fat is the perfect substance for greasing bullet-cartridges. See how we reached this unshakable conclusion inside (see pg 10)
Canals in decline
The once-proud canal system of our nation is seen to be in precipitous decline. What can be done? Continued on page 4
リンカ艹ン暗杀
エイブラハム鼍リンカ艹ンがフォ艹ドの剧场でジョン鼍ウィルクス鼍ブ艹スに至近距离で击たれ杀害された。
column3: Abraham Lincoln assassinated in Fords theatre by John Wilkes Booth, shot dead at close range.

column2: リンカ艹ンお见事
ジョン鼍ウィルクス鼍ブ艹スによるエイブラハム鼍リンカ艹ン暗杀未遂、大yIはフォ艹ドの剧场のバルコニ艹から加害者を投げた。
column3: Failed assassination attempt of Abraham Lincoln by John Wilkes Booth, President throws assailant from balcony of Fords theatre.

column2: Unsporting
Military Submarine invented, globally agreed to be unfair?and banned for all time.
Healthcare
フロ艹レンス鼍ナイチンゲ艹ルはロンドンの圣トマス病院に看护师のための学校を设立した。
column3: Florence Nightingale founds school for nurses in St Thomas' Hospital, London.

column2: Elements organised
Dmitri Mendeleev invents periodic table, listing all 56 known elements.
Cycle fad spreads
Bicycle craze sweeps western world, Velocipedes are must haves!
Sombrero width at an all-time high
It is reported that the width of an average banditos sombrero has risen to an astounding 57 inches in Mexico.
Fire-brigade' established
They're new, but they're good.
column4: Neu und unglaublich gut.

column2: サッカ艹が人气を博す
サッカ艹协会の试合への参加者数が最近增加しており、その光景は劳恸者や贫困层メンバ艹の间で特に人气があることが证明されている。
column3: Attendances at association football matches have risen recently, with the spectacle proving especially popular amongst members of the labouring and destitute classes.

column2: 社说:
Beware the female bicycleatrix. Women astride machines, petticoats fluttering carelessly in the breeze, ankles exposed for all to see, will send men into a deranged frenzy ( pg. 10)
column4: Vorsicht vor weiblicher Rad-Amazone (mehr auf Seite 10)

column2: ポンペイとヘルクラネウムに光が戾る
column3: Pompeii and Herculaneum back to light

column2: New methods of excavation return to the world the cities destroyed by Vesuvius in 79 AD.
社说:
The backward African peoples long for our benevolent governance. Much as the Irish graciously welcomed British overlordship, the black race crave the guiding hand of whites (pg. 10)
column4: Rckstndige Vlker Afrikas ersehnen unsere gtige Fhrung (mehr auf Seite 10)

column2: Literature:
column4: Literatur:

column2: Around the World in 80 days, reviewed for the reader's pleasure and education.
column4: Um die Welt in 80 Tagen, fr Lesespa?und Bildung unserer Leser rezensiert.

column2: コルセット关连の失神
史上最高！ しかしまたしても我が国の温泉鼍病院鼍长椅子はコルセット缔め过ぎの牺牲者であふれている。
column3: Is at an all-time high! Yet again our nations spas, hospitals and chaise-longues are inundated with victims of corset overtightening.

column2: 飞行成功！
フランスの军用飞行船ラ鼍フランスは、往复w行に成功した最初の动力飞行船となった。
column3: La France, a French military airship, becomes first powered airship to make a successful round trip.

column2: High-rise Buildings
column4: Hochhuser

column2: Sky-Scrapers?built in America, these massive steel-framed buildings tower over their surroundings.
column4: Sky-Scraper?in Amerika, massive stahl-ummantelte Hochhuser berragen ihre Umgebung.

column2: Mint juleps saved!
column4: Mint Julep gerettet!

column2: Marvin C. Stone, in the USA, invents the drinking straw?
column4: Marvin C. Stone, USA, erfindet den Strohhalm?

column2: Nothing can go wrong here
column4: Da kann nichts schiefgehen

column2: Cure for morphine addiction discovered in USA: Coca-wine!
column4: Heilung fr Morphium-Sucht in USA entdeckt: Koka-Wein!

column2: ビスマルクが辞任
ビスマルクがドイツの首相を辞任、国家という船は操纵士を失った。
column3: Bismarck resigns as Chancellor of Germany, ship of state loses her pilot.

column2: 社说:
This socialism will destroy western civilisation. Why, it will empower the working classes, allowing them to believe they are as good and worthy as the rich. Pish & fipsy! (pg 10)
column4: Sozialismus wird westliche Zivilisation zerstren (mehr auf Seite 10)

column2: Should the American government act?
column4: Sollte die Regierung Amerikas handeln?

column2: Lynchings of members of the negro race have become commonplace across the heartlands of America. The editorial board of this publication asks: Should the state intervene to stop this practise?
column4: Lynchmorde unter den Schwarzen nehmen in den mittleren Staaten Amerikas zu. Wir stellen die Frage: Sollte der Staat eingreifen und dem ein Ende setzen?

column2: Lift off!
column4: Abheben!

column2: The Ader Eole, a steam powered heavier than air craft, makes a short powered flight near Paris.
column4: Die Ader Eole, ein dampfgetriebenes Gefhrt schwerer als Luft, absolviert kurzen Flug nahe Paris.

column2: 飞行に成功！
Derwitzer Glider becomes the first successful manned aircraft in the world, covering flight distances of up to about 80 feet near Derwitz in Brandenburg.
column4: Derwitzer Glider wird erstes erfolgreiches, bemanntes Fluggert der Welt und berwindet bis zu 80 Fu?Distanz bei Derwitz in Brandenburg.

column2: Moving Pictures!
column4: Bewegte Bilder!

column2: The Kinetoscope astounds viewers by displaying moving pictures at the Brooklyn Institute of Arts and Sciences.
column4: Kinetoskop beeindruckt Publikum im Brooklyn Insitute of Arts and Sciences mit bewegten Bildern.

column2: Hurrah! Tis the gay 90s
column4: Hurra! Hier sind die wilden 90er

column2: As a gayer time than now has surely never been and never again will be, the editorial board respectfully suggests that the phrase the gay 90s?should make its way into the lexicon of our daily discourse.
column4: Eine wildere Zeit als diese hat es noch nie gegeben und wird es wohl nie wieder geben. Wir schlagen daher vor, den Begriff Die Wilden 90er?ins Lexikon aufzunehmen.

column2: Could man one day soar?
column4: Kann der Mensch eines Tages fliegen?

column2: Across our nation, dreamers are speculating that man could one day take to the heavens using mechanical contraptions.
column4: Landesweit hoffen Trumer, dass der Mensch eines Tages mithilfe mechanischer Gerte den Himmel erobern wird.

column2: 社说:
If He had wished man to fly, He would have granted us wings - a guest commentary written by the ship magnate and major shareholder of this newspaper Charles O'Ligarch. (see pg. 10)
column4: Wenn Gott wollte, das wir fliegen, htte er uns Flgel gegeben (mehr auf Seite 10)

column2: Wrong End Foremost
column4: Falsches Ende gibt Ton an

column2: 著名な古生物学者O鼍C鼍マ艹シュは本日、コ艹プ教授によって集められた有名なエラスモサウルスが实际には头が末尾に取り付けられていたことを明らかにした。教授にはコメントを得られなかった。
column3: Reputed paleontologist O.C Marsh revealed today that the famed Elasmosaurus assembled by Professor Cope has in fact its head attached to its tail end. The professor was not available for comment.

column2: 空气より轻い
最初のツェッペリンの飞行が、ドイツのフリ艹ドリヒスハ艹フェン近郊、ボ艹デン湖で行われる。
column3: The first zeppelin flight occurs over Lake Constance near Friedrichshafen, Germany.

column2: 灾害！
强大なハリケ艹ンがテキサス州ガルベストンを袭い、约8,000人が死亡した。
column3: A powerful hurricane has hit Galveston, Texas, USA killing around 8,000 people.

column2: 灾害！
マルティニ艹クで、モン鼍プレ艹が喷火、サンピエ艹ルの町を破坏し、3万人以上が死亡した。
column3: In Martinique, Mount Pele has erupted, destroying the town of Saint-Pierre and killing over 30,000.

column2: 灾害！
ベスビオ山が喷火し、ナポリを坏灭させた。
column3: Mount Vesuvius has erupted, devastating Naples.

column2: 灾害！
地震と津波がシチリアのメッシナとカラブリアを袭い、7万人以上が死亡した。
column3: An earthquake and tsunami has hit  Messina and Calabria, in Sicily, killing over 70,000 people.

column2: The Captain of Kpenick
column4: Der Hauptmann von Kpenick

column2: An impostor masquerading as a German military officer managed to fool soldiers in Berlin and steal over 4000 marks due to so-called suspicions of crooked bookkeeping. He gave a receipt.
column4: Hochstapler gibt sich als deutscher Militroffizier aus, trickst Soldaten in Berlin aus und stiehlt mehr als 4000 Mark wegen angeblich falscher Buchfhrung. Er gab eine Quittung.

column2: 灾害！
これまで建造された中で最大の船であるRMSタイタニック号が、I女航海中に北大西洋で冰山に激突した诟に沈没、1500以上の人苘が死亡したと思われる。
column3: The RMS Titanic, the largest ship ever built, has sunk after striking an iceberg in the North Atlantic during her maiden voyage, over 1,500 people are believed to have perished in the disaster.

column2: 灾害！
北海の岚がオランダを袭い、低地が锢膜筏皮い搿1万もの人が死亡したと思われる。
column3: North Sea storm hits the Netherlands, flooding the lowlands. 10,000 people believed dead.

column2: 发见！
ハイラム鼍ビンガムは、以前には知られていなかったインカの都市マチュピチュを再发见した。
column3: Hiram Bingham rediscovers Machu Picchu, a previously unknown Incan city.

column2: 吃烃者、欢喜！
ギデオン鼍サンドバックによってジッパ艹が发明された。
Breakfast is saved
Charles Strite invents the  pop-up bread toaster.
大陆移动说
ドイツの著名な科学者アルフレ艹ト鼍ヴェ艹ゲナ艹は、我苘が立っているこの大陆は地球の表面上を动いているという理论を提示した。
column3: Alfred Wegener, a prominent German scientist, has put forth the theory that the very continents upon which we stand could be moving about on the Earth's surface.

column2: General relativity

Albert Einstein has published his theory of general relativity, a confusing and complicated set of formulae which seeks to explain the relationship between space, time, gravity and a myriad of other forces.
社说:
This feminism will destroy western civilisation. Equality of the sexes is a depravity which no civilised people would contemplate. Why, feminism could lead to women drivers (pg. 10)
column4: Der Feminismus wird westl. Zivilisation zerstren (mehr auf Seite 10)

column2: Free inside:
column4: Kostenlose Beilage:

column2: A 'cross-word puzzle', a whimsical pastime which will nonetheless allow the reader to demonstrate the fortitude of their perspicacity.
column4: Ein 'Kreuzwort-Rtsel', ein netter Zeitvertreib, mit dem unsere Leser ihren Scharfsinn demonstrieren knnen.

column2: Sherlock Holmes' ending controversy
column4: Kontroverse zum Ende von Sherlock Holmes

column2: After a massive fan outcry due to the bittersweet death of the famous detective, author Sir Arthur Conan Doyle decides to bring him back from the dead, providing clarification and closure.
column4: Nach massivem Aufschrei der Fans zum bittersen Ende des berhmten Detektivs, entschliet sich Sir Arthur Conan Doyle ihn wiederzubeleben und verspricht Klarheit und Abschluss.

column2: 记录的な飞行
チャ艹ルズ鼍リンドバ艹グは、ニュ艹ヨ艹クからパリまで无休单独飞行で大西洋を横断(1927年5月20日-21日)した初めての人となった。
column3: Charles Lindbergh becomes the first person to fly solo across the Atlantic Ocean (May 20?1, 1927), nonstop from New York to Paris.

column2: To the stars!
column4: Zu den Sternen!

column2: Worlds first flight of a liquid-fueled rocket by Robert Goddard.
column4: Weltweit erster Raketenflug mit Flssigtreibstoff von Robert Goddard.

column2: An end to beards?
column4: Das Ende der Brte?

column2: First electric razor patented by the American manufacturer Col. Jacob Schick.
column4: Erster elektr. Rasierer vom amerikanischen Hersteller Col. Jacob Schick patentiert.

column2: The future of music
column4: Zukunftsmusik

column2: The first selective Jukeboxes introduced by the Automated Musical Instrument Company.
column4: Erster Musikautomat mit Musikwahl von Automated Musical Instrument Company vorgestellt.

column2: なぜかはわからない
ポ艹ルシッティングの流行が西洋世界を风靡している
社说:
This 'television' genuinely will destroy western civilisation. Today, horrendous wooden puppets, tomorrow, horrendous drunken and lascivious twenty-somethings? (see page 10)
column4: Fernseher werden westliche Zivilisation vernichten (mehr auf Seite 10)

column2: 社说:
This 'jazz' will destroy western civilisation. Never in the history of music has such a corrupting rhythm been heard. The jungle beat has no place in our repressed society (pg. 10)
column4: Jazz wird westl. Zivilisation vernichten (weiter auf Seite 10)

column2: The jazz craze!
column4: Der Jazz-Wahn!

column2: A new fad has awakened the passions of the nation's music-listeners. Frenetic dancing, unchaperoned licentiousness and race-mixing are natural byproducts of this far out and wrong musical form.
column4: Musikliebhaber von neuer Marotte erfasst: Frenetische Tnze, Zuchtlosigkeit und Rassenvermischung sind Nebenprodukte dieser falschen Musikform.

column2: Literary digest: Ulysees
column4: Literatur-bersicht: Ulysees

column2: Penned by Irish-man of some repute, James Joyce, Ulysees describes one day in the life of a Dublin protagonist merely living his life in a normal fashion, struggling... (continued on page 19)
column4: Bekannter Ire James Joyce beschreibt in Ulysees einen Tag im Leben eines Protagonisten in Dublin und seinen Widrigkeiten (mehr auf Seite 19)

column2: To Egypt!
column4: Auf nach gypten!

column2: More astounding archaeological discoveries occured today in the Nile region, furthering the international fascination with all things Oriental... (continued on page 2)
column4: Weitere erstaunliche, archologische Entdeckungen in der Nil-Region befeuern Faszination mit dem Orientalischen ?(weiter auf Seite 2)

column2: Bauhaus architecture
column4: Bauhaus-Architektur

column2: A futuristic new artistic archetectural style, known as Bauhaus, has risen to prominence in the cities of Weimar, Berlin and Dessau.
column4: Futuristischer, neuer Kunst-Architekturstil, bekannt als Bauhaus, erobert die Stdte Weimar, Berlin und Dessau.

column2: Oddball duo cause chaos
column4: Verrcktes Duo erzeugt Chaos

column2: Two men, one fat and one thin, have appeared in court accused of mischief-making and general buffoonery. Due to the severity of the crime, which involved the demolition of a house and theft of an ass, prosecuters are expected to seek the death penalty.
column4: Zwei Mnner, einer dick, einer dnn, stehen wegen groben Unfugs und grober Clownerei vor Gericht. Aufgrund der Schwere der Vorwrfe, die die Zerstrung eines Hauses und Diebstahl umfassen, wird die Forderung der Todesstrafe durch Anklger erwartet.

column2: 犬、子供を啮む。
恶意ある动物の攻击により地域社会は冲击を受け、子供たちの安全に关心のある亲は行动を求めている。
column3: Vicious animal attack leaves community in shock, parents concerned with safety of their children demand action.

column2: Global cooling.
column4: Globale Abkhlung.

column2: Scientists warn another ice age might be starting as recorded temperatures drop from year to year.
column4: Forscher warnen vor neuer Eiszeit, da Temperaturen jhrlich fallen.

column2: Missing child found
column4: Vermisstes Kind gefunden

column2: He was hiding in a barn! The missing child case resolved after extensive search by local volunteers discovers the child hiding in the nearby abandoned building.
column4: Versteckt in einer Scheune! Der Fall eines vermissten Kindes fand gutes Ende, nachdem engagierte Suchmannschaften es in einem nahen, verlassenen Gebude fanden.

column2: Damsel brutally murdered
column4: Maid brutal ermordet

column2: The horrifically-mutilated corpse of a damsel was discovered yesterday tied to a train track. The public is advised to be on the lookout for a man with a large moustache, a top hat and a black opera cloak.
column4: Entsetzlich entstellter Krper einer jungen Maid wurde gestern, an Eisenbahnschienen gefesselt, gefunden. Fahndung nach Mann mit Schnauzbart, Zylinder und schwarzem Umhang luft.

column2: Rabbit emerges from hat
column4: Der Hase aus dem Hut

column2: A man, who claimed to possess mystic powers, was seen to produce a rabbit from a top hat yesterday. He is currently being investigated on suspicion of unnatural practises.
column4: Ein Mann mit angeblich mystischen Krften wurde gestern gesehen, als er einen Hasen aus dem Hut zauberte. Untersuchungen mit Verdacht auf unnatrliche Praktiken im Gange.

column2: A glimpse into the year 2000
column4: Ein Blick in das Jahr 2000

column2: A prominent futurologist has granted an insight into the distant year 2000 A.D. Speaking to our futurology correspondent, he said "By 2000 each landed gentleman will own at least 5 hot-air balloons".
column4: Ein bekannter Zukunftsforscher gibt Einblick in das ferne Jahr 2000 A.D. Er sagt: Im Jahr 2000 besitzt jeder Gentleman wenigstens 5 Heiluftballons?

column2: News counterfeiting!
column4: Geflschte Nachrichten!

column2: An Irish-man, a Pole, and a Prussian were arrested yesterday as part of an ongoing investigation into a shadowy cabal which concocted news stories and presented them as if they were factual.
column4: Festnahmen gegen einen Iren, Polen und Preuen im Rahmen der Untersuchung einer Schattenorganisation, die der Erstellung falscher Nachrichten und deren Verkauf als Fakten verdchtigt werden.

column2: 12人が突き杀される!
昨日、雄牛が暴れ、男性5人?女性7人を死亡させた。これまで稳やかな性质だったという牛は、通りかかった烃突扫除人に首をはねられた。
column3: An enraged gentleman cow gored 5 men and 7 women to death yesterday. The gentleman cow, who had previously been of a gentle nature, was beheaded by a passing chimney-sweep.

column2: Bridge collapse!
column4: Brcke eingestrzt!

column2: Claims the life of a butcher just outside our nation's capital. The bucther, who was a character of some repute in the locality in question, is survived by his brother, a baker, and a son who manufactures and sells candlesticks.
column4: Ein Metzger wurde auerhalb unserer Hauptstadt in den Tod gerissen. Der lokal bekannte Metzger hinterlsst seinen Bruder, einen Bcker und einen Sohn, der Kerzenhalter herstellt und verkauft.

column2: バルカンの平静
先迳の日曜、セルビア人鼍クロアチア人鼍ボスニア人鼍トルコ人鼍ブルガリア人鼍ル艹マニア人鼍アルバニア人鼍ギリシア人が集まり、バルカン半岛が现在浸っている大いなる平和を祝った。
column3: Serbs, Croats, Bosnians, Turks, Bulgarians, Romanians, Albanians and Greeks came together last Sunday to celebrate the great peace in which the Balkan peninsula presently bathes.

column2: 投书
ある读者は、无谋な全速运转と危ない操纵で茔客の命を危险にさらす不注意なフェリ艹パイロットに注意を促している。
column3: A reader calls attention to careless ferry pilots putting lives of passengers at risk with their reckless full speed driving and risky manoeuvres.

column2: 天候
Probabilities for the next week: Cloudy and rainy, with north and north-east winds and lowering temperatures.
column4: Aussichten fr nchste Woche: Wolkig und Regen, mit Winden aus Nord und Nordost und niedrigen Temperaturen.

column2: Tragic city fire
column4: Tragisches Feuer in Stadt

column2: Fire Department blamed for demonstrating a lack of discipline and efficiency allowing fire to spread across multiple blocks leading to the biggest and most tragic city fire to date.
column4: Feuerwache wegen fehlender Disziplin und Effizienz fr das Ausbreiten eines Feuers ber mehrere Huser verantwortlich gemacht, das zum gr鲞ten Brand aller Zeiten in der Stadt fhrte.

column2: Fishhook robbery!
column4: Angel-Raub

column2: Police inform us that a robber managed to steal a substantial amount of money from a  teller's desk at a local bank using a fishhook and a stick while the teller was being distracted by an accomplice.
column4: Die Polizei berichtet vom Raub eines beachtlichen Geldbetrags in lokaler Bank unter Verwendung eines Angelhakens und Stockes, whrend Komplize den Kassenbeamten ablenkte.

column2: Let them jump!
column4: Lasst sie springen!

column2: If children have to be still it's a torture for them, scientists claim. Rapid movement of body being the correct expression of joy at very young age should be encouraged not frowned upon.
column4: Forscher bezeichnen das Stillsitzen mssen von Kindern Folter. Ausdauernde Bewegung ist wichtig zum Ausdruck von Freude fr kleine Kinder und sollte nicht unterdrckt werden.

column2: Wooden pavements
column4: Hlzerne Brgersteige

column2: A new describes chemical processes of hardening wood to increase its endurance beyond that of traditional building materials. Should city boards begin paving streets with wooden panels?
column4: Neue Untersuchung enthllt chemische Prozesse zur Hrtung von Holz im Bauwesen. Sollte die Stadt Straen mit Holz pflastern?

column2: Life without food?
column4: Leben ohne Nahrung?

column2: A man claiming he can abstain from food for at least 30 days and retain full physical and mental fitness challenges physicians to subject his abilities to a test.
column4: Ein Mann behauptet, 30 Tage ohne Nahrung bei voller krperlicher und geistiger Strke berleben zu knnen, und fordert Forscher heraus, ihn zu testen.

column2: 死の热病
热带から归港した船员2名が、未知の热病で死亡した模样。酷い寒荬诵いて极端なfきと妄想が起こり、最终的に息をひきとった。
column3: Two sailors from a brig returning from tropical areas are reported to have died of an unknown fever. They experienced severe chills followed by extreme thirst and delusions until both eventually perished.

column2: 人工ダイヤモンド
A European chemist claims by the process known only to himself he managed to coat an ordinary crystal with a surface resembling in every respect that of a real diamond.
column4: Europischer Chemiker behauptet, mit einem nur ihm bekannten Prozess einen normalen Kristall mit Material ummantelt zu haben, der ihn in allen Aspekten zum Diamanten macht.

column2: 神からの手纸
One of the poor members of our society receiving a charity letter marked as "from God" responded by giving thanks for the money received, but warns the deity against tax levy and post office theft.
column4: Ein armes Mitglied unserer Gesellschaft dankt dem Sender eines Almosenbriefes von Gott?fr erhaltenes Geld, warnt Sender jedoch vor Steuerforderungen und Briefraub.

column2: Medical news
column4: Medizin-Neuheiten

column2: Top European doctors have speculated that smoke from factory stacks could be responsible for the increased level of respiratory problems seen amongst children.
column4: Fhrende europische rzte verdchtigen Rauch aus Fabrikschloten als Ursache fr Zunahme von Atemstrungen unter Kindern.

column2: Vampyre hysteria
column4: Vampir-Hysterie

column2: Another outbreak of vampyre hysteria has occurred in Romanian lands. Superstitious peasants have taken to daubing their necks with garlic in a bid to ward off the nefarious ghouls.
column4: Ein neuer Fall von Vampir-Hysterie in Rumnien. Aberglubische Passanten schmieren Nacken mit Knoblauch ein, zum Schutz vor bsartigen Ghulen.

column2: オオカミ、４人杀害
先迳、シベリアでは、オオカミの群れが町を袭い住民４名を杀害した。ルピナス(贪欲)の兽を狩るため、武装警察が派遣された。
column3: A pack of wolves raided a town in Siberia last week and killed four of the inhabitants. Armed policemen have been dispatched to the area to hunt down the lupine beasts.

column2: Horrific puppets
column4: Schreckliche Puppen

column2: Ghastly puppets have become a generally accepted part of daily life. The latest terrifying abomination to make its presence felt is a smiling wooden boy with a fixed grin, styled Bimbo?
column4: Schreckliche Puppen finden mehr Akzeptanz. Neueste Abartigkeit ist ein debil grinsender Holzjunge im Bimbo-Stil.

column2: Drinking contest
column4: Trinkwettbewerb

column2: Irish-man Bill Whelan bested rivals from Russia and Scotland in an alcohol-consuming contest in New York last week. He attributed his victory to sheer love of booze?from his hospital bed.
column4: Der Ire Bill Whelan schlgt in New York Rivalen aus Russland und Schottland in einem Alkohol-Trinkwettbewerb. Den Sieg schrieb er vom Krankenbett aus der Liebe zum Fusel?zu.

column2: 最古の男
Respected gentleman Jimmy Williams has been named oldest man alive. Williams, from Americans deep south, politely entreated reporters from this news-paper to remove themselves from his lawn.
银行强盗！
Local bank in $ANYPROVINCE$ has been invaded by a masked gang of ne'er-do-wells. The police are searching for the criminals and is granting a reward for any information leading to their capture.
ツア艹中のピアノ猫
「ピアノ猫」として知られる有名な猫ピアニストが、今迳$OURCAPITAL$にやってくる。猫ア艹ティストは、クラシック作品のシリ艹ズを披露する予定だ。
column3: The famous feline pianist known simply as the Piano Cat is scheduled to arrive in $OURCAPITAL$ this week. The cat artist is expected to play a series of classical pieces.

column2: 特e讲演

The Council of Science of $OURCAPITAL$ is to present a series of special lectures on the origins of civilisation in the Fertile Crescent. Special presentations of pottery shards from Tyre are planned.
注意！注意！
巨大な岚が到来している。公安职员の指示は次のとおり。Do not sweep any chimneys during the storm. Accidents may occur if this warning is not heeded.
column3: A storm of gigantic proportions is incoming. Instructions from Public Safety officials are: Do not sweep any chimneys during the storm. Accidents may occur if this warning is not heeded.

column2: Trade Summit
Current European and International Tariffs as well as protectionist practices will be discussed next Thursday in $OURCAPITAL$.
Postal Convention
Today $OURCOUNTRY$ and foreign authorities are assembled to discuss postage fees for all letters sent overseas.
Modern Coal Trade
The free trade of coal for railway locomotives and eventually seafaring ships in the western world is being discussed today at the local Chamber of Commerce.
Unlikely to become Cardinal
Unofficial comments from Pope's inner circle in Vatican denounce the rumors of the coming elevation of Archbishop as premature.
General's funeral.
A former general and banker who died at his house last week to be buried today. Only his intimate friends will be present at the ceremony.
Mountain top birth
A woman who fell ill during ascension to the mountain top was taken by her two companions to a shelter 4000 feet above sea level to give birth to a healthy boy.
Moral expansion?
Can we allow history to record that we crushed foreign peoples' dreams of freedom by subjugating them to our government? Can we govern them without their consent?
Blackmailer arrested.
A former actor and an alleged deserter from the army was today jailed for annoying a famous actress with requests for money.
Skirting evil
Fashion cannot dictate the dust of the sidewalks to be dragged into homes, a physician claims, and demands women abandon the new trend of wearing trailing skirts for health reasons.
信仰疗法で子供死亡
两亲が、かかりつけの医师を信仰疗法士に替えた诟、赤痢にかかった12岁の少女は病院で死亡した。
column3: A 12 yearsold girl sick with dysentery died at a local hospital after parents replaced the family physician with a faith doctor.

column2: Respect of Yardies gained!
A local man from $ANYPROVINCE$ reports having beat down many men armed with rifles in a local pub. The man claimd the assailants put themselves at a disadvantage by using weapons.
Article review
All newspaper articles to be subjected to a review by a special board to confirm their accuracy and truthfulness. In unrelated news: The journalist writing about wooden pavements has vanished.
Law discussed
Lawyers from all over the country convened today in $OURCAPITAL$ to discuss eventual updates to the country's judiciary system in matters of civil and criminal law.
The history of $OURCOUNTRY$
A definitive multivolume work on the history of the $OURCOUNTRY$ civilization has finally been completed. Leading historians proclaim it the greatest reference yet, true to our heroic deeds.
バッハコンサ艹ト
A dash of nostalgia for all enthusiasts of music. A collection of Bach's most famous pieces will be played by the $OURCOUNTRY$ National Orchestra next week in the Grand Concert Hall of $OURCAPITAL$.
Stone delivered
Inhabitants of $ANYPROVINCE$ puzzled by the delivery of gigantic pieces of marble from abroad. Rumour has it that a new grandiose monument will be built in the capital's main square.
Mechanical contraptions
Gadgets of various sorts will play an increasingly large part in everyday life, according to a top boffin who heads the engineering department at $OURCAPITAL$ university.
锻冶屋の死
昨日、$ANYPROVINCE$で锻冶屋が、蹄铁をされようとしていた马に蹴られ死亡した。
column3: A blacksmith was kicked to death by a horse he was attempting to shoe in $ANYPROVINCE$ yesterday.

column2: 日食
Readers are politely reminded that a solar eclipse is due to occur this coming Friday. The temporary phenomenon is no cause for panic or work stoppages.
单眼贩卖数
何十年にもわたって上缯していた单眼の卖上高は、平准化が见られる。
column3: Monocle sales, which have been rising for decades, appear to have levelled out. Orders have held steady through the last quarter.

column2: タイム鼍トラベル
A prominent author of penny dreadfuls has put forth the idea that man could move backwards and forwards through time, appearing at various dates in the past and present.
识字率
Literacy is at an all-time high across the globe, new figures show. Previously the preserve of the clergy and noble classes, it is now seen even amongst the common labourer and fairer sex.
Public science?lecture
Aspiring natural philosophers are advised that a lecture on geology, or the study of rock formations, will take place in the $OURCAPITAL$ auditorium on Tuesday next. Admission is ?.
Meeting interrupted
A political club was invaded by campaigners for equality of the sexes yesterday. The womens' husbands have been reprimanded by the constabulary for neglecting to control their wives.
The English Man
The Englishman maintains a stiff upper lip, has a strong sense of fair play and is an advocate of liberty. Inventive, graceful and witty, he cuts a striking figure amongst the nationalities.
Wave of Influenza
column4: Grippewelle

column2: Flu sweeps $OURCOUNTRY$. There are already many reported infections throughout the land. Laymen fear a pandemic might be coming, while experts assure it's just a seasonal occurrence.
column4: Die Grippe beutelt $OURCOUNTRY$. Infektionen breiten sich aus. Laien frchten eine Pandemie, Experten werten die Situation als saisonale Begebenheit.

column2: Hoarde uncovered
column4: Goldschatz entdeckt

column2: The remnants of an old coin hoard were found in $ANYPROVINCE$ this week. Authorities mention many pieces of golden coinage discovered by a farmer plowing a field after heavy rain.
column4: Die Reste eines alten Goldschatzes wurden diese Woche in $ANYPROVINCE$ entdeckt. Offizielle melden Unmenge an Goldmnzen, die von Bauern in der Feldarbeit im Regen ausgegraben wurden.

column2: メ艹トル法は马鹿げている
英国のある政治家は、ヤ艹ドポンド法こそ永续の单位だ、として「フランスのメ艹トル法のような马鹿げた单位は决して广まらない」と主张している。
column3: According to a British statesman, the Imperial System is the way of the future: 'This French Metric nonsense is bound to never catch on' he claims.

まさに未来の光！
column3: Truely the light of the future!

column2: This may doom us all!
column4: Dies kann uns alle vernichten!

column2: Good news, everyone!
column4: Gute Nachrichten!

column2: これは新时代の夜明けだ！
column3: This is the dawn of a new age!

column2: 今日の进步は、昨日の计画であった。
かの国がそれをうまく使うよう愿おう。
column3: Let us hope they use it for good.

column2: 科学は眠ることなど出来ない！
しかし、いかほどの费用だったのか？
かの国は次に何を考えるだろうか？

column2: It will never catch on.
column4: Das wird nie was werden.

column2: かの国は明らかに我が国からアイデアを盗んだのだ。
column3: They clearly stole the idea from us.

column2: $TAG_0_0$の新政党

$TAG_0_0$で新たな$STRING_0_2$の政党、$STRING_0_0$が结成された。「我苘は现在、新党员を募集しており、现代のあらゆる政治团体が必要とする支援体制を构苎する过程にある」と党关侪者は述べ、新党は不满を持った活动家や他团体に幻灭したメンバ艹を结集し、全国大会を予定していると发表した。そこで代表を选出して讨论の场において合意をする予定である。彼らは、不利な状况であっても、政权を握ることについて前向きであり续けると主张している。
column3: A new $STRING_0_2$ political party, the $STRING_0_0$, has been formed in $TAG_0_0$. 'We're currently in the process of recruiting new members and organizing the support structure every modern political unit requires', a party official commented. Uniting disgruntled activists and disillusioned members of other outfits, the new party announced to have scheduled a national convention, where they plan to elect their representatives and agree on the platform. They claim to remain optimistic about ever coming to power despite all odds.

$TAG_0_0$で新たな$STRING_0_2$の政党、$STRING_0_0$が结成された。新党は不满を持った活动家や他团体に幻灭したメンバ艹を结集し、全国大会を予定していると发表した。
